itemInfo.itemDesc: An essence extracted from Fruit of Magic Power, a fruit obtained at a low rate through Farming. It's used as an ingredient in Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: Can be made by combining other ingredients with Fruit of Magic Power using Alchemy.

item.name: Fruit of Magic Power
item.desc: An ingredient used in Alchemy that can be obtained through farming. It can be used directly or refined into an essence for use.\n- How to Obtain: This alchemical ingredient can be obtained through Farming in a Garden, but only rarely.

item.name: Fruit of Magic Power
item.desc: An ingredient used in Alchemy that can be obtained through farming. It can be used directly or refined into an essence for use.\n- How to Obtain: This alchemical ingredient can be obtained through Farming in a Garden, but only rarely.

item.name: Birch Sap
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained from Birch Trees with a Fluid Collector.

item.name: Powder of Darkness
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: There’s a small chance of acquiring it from Rocks.

item.name: Dry Mane Grass
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy. 
- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered directly from Wild Herbs using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!
